name: Hardware Tycoon Game Mod File
summary: Learn about .HTMOD files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: To open an HTMOD file with Hardware Tycoon follow these steps:
Click the gear icon at the bottom of the program window
Select "Enable, disable, load or delete mods," then click "Load a Mod"
Navigate to and choose the HTMOD file
To open an HTMOD file with Hardware Tycoon Mod Tool, select "Load Modification." To create an HTMOD file with Hardware Tycoon Mod Tool, select "New Modification."

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
